info:
Thomas started composing on the C64 in 1986-87. He was proficient at it right from the beginning, and he made his own player. In 2005-2006 he was bitten by a C64 bug again and created JCH NewPlayer 21.g5  for JCH Editor V3.04 20G4, as well as a new music editor called SID Factory 0.5 (alpha 1).

[url]http://noname.c64.org/csdb/scener/?id=677[/url]
